meanings.definition: The state or quality of being isotopic.
meanings.sent1: The isotopies of the elements were studied in chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use isotopies to understand the composition of different materials.
meanings.sent3: The isotopies of the twins made it hard for their friends to tell them apart.
meanings.sent4: The isotopies of the city's skyline created a beautiful pattern against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful blocks to explain isotopies to the students.

meanings.definition: The existence of isotopes of a particular element.
meanings.sent1: Isotopies play a crucial role in nuclear science.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the isotopies of the uranium sample.
meanings.sent3: The isotopies of the rare metal surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The isotopies of the forest trees varied greatly in different regions.
meanings.sent5: The geologist collected rock samples to study their isotopies.
